story:
Short Summary

I think contributors will fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. 

Introduction of myself and my background.

My Name is Dries Prinsloo and I have 20 Years Experience in New Media (Mobile & Internet) Content and Content Rights Brokering, New Media (Video Streaming Platforms for Mobile and the Internet) Digital Platforms and Digital Strategies. and i am 48 years old.

A Brief description of our campaign and why it's important to us.

The magnitude of what contributors will help us achieve.

WITH THESE KINDS OF PROJECTED GROWTH GLOBALLY THERE ARE MORE THAN ENOUGH SPACE FOR AN ALTERNATIVE : ALL NEW VIDEO, PHOTO & OBJECTIVE SOCIAL NETWORKING PLATFORM.

The Global Video Streaming Market, valued at USD 42.14 Billion in the year 2019 has been witnessing unprecedented growth in the last few years on the back of increasing internet penetration, escalating number of smartphone users and rising investment in good content.

Additionally, increasing technology in digital media and lockdown across regions and countries as a result of Covid-19 pandemic will drive the Video Streaming market value in the near future.

Traditional media companies and the streaming video on demand platforms like Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon Prime are competing for the best quality content to stream on their platforms and grow their subscriber base and the pandemic has provided an opportunity to these companies to leverage the discretionary spend of the consumers. Among the Streaming Type of the Video Streaming market (Video on Demand and Live), Video on Demand has been gaining popularity globally and is expected to keep growing in the forecast period. "Market Study Report"

The demand of VOD in Video Streaming is due to demand of watching videos according to their choice which will keep increasing in future. Among the Revenue Model of the Video Streaming market (AVOD, TVOD and SVOD), SVOD has been gaining popularity globally and is expected to keep growing in the forecast period. The demand of SVOD in Video Streaming is due to its availability anytime and higher revenue generating type which will keep increasing in future. Among the End User of the Video Streaming market (Media and Entertainment, Education and Awareness, IT and E- commerce, Others), Media and Entertainment is highly popular globally and is expected to keep growing in the forecast period. The demand of Media and Entertainment in Video Streaming is due to the demand of entertainment on digital platform which will keep increasing in future. "Market Study Report"

Online Games

Revenue in the Online Games segment is projected to reach US$18,219m in 2020.

Revenue is expected to show an annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2025) of 0.9%, resulting in a projected market volume of US$19,047m by 2025.

User penetration will be 12.5% in 2020 and is expected to hit 13.8% by 2025.

The average revenue per user (ARPU) is expected to amount to US$19.55.

In global comparison, most revenue will be generated in China (US$4,523m in 2020).

"Statista 2020"

Gaming Networks

Revenue in the Gaming Networks segment is projected to reach US$2,463m in 2020.

Revenue is expected to show an annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2025) of 3.9%, resulting in a projected market volume of US$2,986m by 2025.

User penetration will be 1.2% in 2020 and is expected to hit 1.4% by 2025.

The average revenue per user (ARPU) is expected to amount to US$26.61.

In global comparison, most revenue will be generated in the United States (US$484m in 2020).

"Statista 2020"

Digital Media

Revenue in the Digital Media market is projected to reach US$199,643m in 2020.

The market's largest segment is Video Games with a projected market volume of US$92,658m in 2020.

In global comparison, most revenue will be generated in the United States (US$63,992m in 2020).

In the Video Games segment, the number of users is expected to amount to 2,702.0m by 2025.

The average revenue per user (ARPU) in the Video Games segment is projected to amount to US$40.57 in 2020.

"Statista 2020"

Digital Video Ad Spend  : 

The global digital video ad spend is expected to grow from 26.49 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 to 35.05 billion in 2024.

"Statista 2020"

Global revenue of the eSports market 2020, by segment

Published by Christina Gough, Oct 13, 2020

 This statistic displays an estimate of the eSports market revenue worldwide in 2020, broken down by segment. During 2020, the merchandise and tickets segment in the global eSports market was expected to generate 52.5 million U.S. dollars in revenue.

"Statista 2020"

Revenue of the global eSports market 2018-2023

Published by Christina Gough, Oct 13, 2020

This statistic shows the global eSports market revenue from 2018 to 2023. In 2020, the global eSports market was valued at just over 950 million U.S. dollars. According to the source's estimates, global eSports market revenue will reach almost 1.6 billion U.S. dollars in 2023. The eSports industry is expected to grow rapidly in the coming years. The majority of these revenues come from sponsorships and advertising, and the rest from media rights, publisher fees, merchandise and tickets, digital, and streaming. In terms of revenues, Asia and North America represent the two largest eSports markets, with China alone accounting for almost one fifth of the market.

"Statista 2020"

Worldwide eSports viewer numbers 2018-2023, by type

Published by Christina Gough, Apr 28, 2020

 The eSports market has boomed in recent years with more and more viewers tuning in to watch their favorite games being played by some of the best gamers in the world. By 2023, there are expected to be almost 300 million frequent viewers of eSports worldwide, a vast increase from the 173 million in 2018. Additionally, some 351 million people are forecast to be occasional viewers of eSports by 2023.

"Statista 2020"

eSports in the U.S.

There were an estimated 25.7 million eSports viewers in the United States in 2018, a figure which is projected to rise to over 46 million by 2023. This means that, by 2023, an estimated 15.5 percent of internet users will be watching eSports at least once per month. This is a considerable number for an industry that was once considered to be a niche section of the gaming market. While the potential for the eSports industry in the United States is huge, it is nothing compared the market size in Asia Pacific. According to the estimates, over half of the world's frequent eSports viewers and enthusiasts can be found in Asia Pacific, compared to just 12 percent in North America.

"Statista 2020"

Leading eSports tournaments

The most watched eSports event as of January 2018 was the 2018 Mid-Season Invitational League of Legends tournament. This tournament was hosted by Germany and France and recorded 60 million unique viewers. With millions of viewers tuning in to watch expert gamers battle it out, it is unsurprising that large sums of money are at stake. The International 2019, which was the ninth edition of the annual DOTA 2 world championship, had a combined prize pool of over 34 million U.S. dollars. In addition, the cumulative prize pool for DOTA 2 tournaments around the world in 2019 stood at a huge 47 million U.S. dollars.

"Statista 2020"

SVOD – subscription video on demand

SVOD is similar to traditional TV packages, allowing users to consume as much content as they desire at a flat rate per month. Major services include Sky (plus its subsidiary Now TV), Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and Hulu, with new services coming from the likes of Apple, HBO and Disney.

With SVOD, there is far greater freedom to opt out, as consumers aren’t tied into a long-term contract. This offers greater flexibility to users, and providers of SVOD are continually challenged with retaining consumers, by providing exclusive new content, aggressive pricing schemes – and probably both. "Market Study Report"

Video Streaming (SVoD)

Revenue in the Video Streaming (SVoD) segment is projected to reach US$51,617m in 2020.

Revenue is expected to show an annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2025) of 10.7%, resulting in a projected market volume of US$85,735m by 2025.

User penetration will be 11.9% in 2020 and is expected to hit 17.2% by 2025.

The average revenue per user (ARPU) is expected to amount to US$58.52.

In global comparison, most revenue will be generated in the United States (US$24,079m in 2020).

In the Video Streaming (SVoD) segment, the number of users is expected to amount to 1,337.1m by 2025. "Market Study Report 2020"

TVOD – transactional video on demand

TVOD is the opposite of subscription video, where consumers purchase content on a pay-per-view basis. There are two sub-categories, known as electronic sell-through (EST), where you pay once to gain permanent access to a piece of content; and download to rent (DTR), where customers access a piece of content for a limited time for a smaller fee. 

TVOD services tend to offer more recent releases, providing rights holders with higher revenues and giving consumers timely access to new content. TVOD services typically retain customers by offering attractive price incentives, so they continue to return in the future.

Examples of TVOD services include: Apple’s iTunes, Sky Box Office and Amazon’s video store. Imagen can provide both subscription and pay-per-view models for your hosted video. "Market Study Report 2020"

Pay-per-View (TVoD)

Revenue in the Pay-per-View (TVoD) segment is projected to reach US$4,682m in 2020.

Revenue is expected to show an annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2025) of 1.9%, resulting in a projected market volume of US$5,138m by 2025.

User penetration will be 6.4% in 2020 and is expected to hit 7.3% by 2025.

The average revenue per user (ARPU) is expected to amount to US$9.75.

In global comparison, most revenue will be generated in the United States (US$1,688m in 2020). 

"Market Study Report 2020"

A new player to the game – is Premium Video on Demand (PVOD) here to stay?

With films typically collecting up to 90% of their lifetime gross during the first four weeks of release, studios have long been pushing to shorten the exclusive theatrical window. Check out how the popularity of PVOD is on the rise. 

"Market Study Report 2020" Discover PVOD

AVOD – advertising-based video on demand

Unlike SVOD and TVOD services, AVOD is free to consumers. However, much like broadcast television, consumers need to sit through advertisements. You can see AVOD in action when watching DailyMotion, YouTube and 4OD, where ad revenue is used to offset production and hosting costs. 

Premium content owners rarely use AVOD as it generates lower amounts of revenue than SVOD and TVOD. It’s interesting to note that YouTube has started to move its subscription-based Premium content to an ad-based model, with reports that the service was slow to catch on with users.

"Market Study Report 2020"

Live Streaming :

Market Snapshot

Live videos or live streaming activity increased significantly by the mid of 2015. Brands and public figures became active in interacting with their intended audience via online platforms like YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram. Furthermore, as the popularity of esports and video games increased among millennials and generation Z, live video game streaming gained momentum, thereby boosting the global live streaming market. As per a survey conducted by the Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB) in 2018, more than two-thirds (67%) of consumers, globally, have streamed live video content, and 52% of that group prefer free, ad-supported live streaming, over subscription-based and à la carte services. Additionally, 47% of consumers, globally, have reported an increase in their live streaming activity since last year. Furthermore, social platforms are the key source of live video content, and TV is the most popular type of live video content accessed.

"Market Research Future 2020"

Amidst the nationwide full/partial lockdowns across the globe due to the spread of COVID-19, live streaming activity has grown by almost 50% as compared to the pre-COVID period. In April 2020 alone, several live streaming platforms such as Twitch and YouTube witnessed a significant increase in the viewership. Analyzing the trend and the nature/characteristics of COVID-19, even during the COVID-19 crisis, when people are maintaining social distancing and avoiding huge gatherings, live streaming is increasingly becoming the preferred option for organizing concerts and other big events. This scenario is expected to increase the compound annual growth rate of the market to 28.1% during the forecast period of 2020 to 2027.

"Market Study Report 2020"

The global live streaming market is dominated by a few big players who have been offering add-on services and features to their live streaming platforms. Amazon, Twitch, Vimeo, IBM Corporation, Facebook, and Google are key companies offering live streaming platforms. These companies have witnessed a significant increase in their year on year revenue and viewership. Apart from big players (mentioned above), the small and regional players, including Huya.com, Periscope, Flux Broadcast, and EventStreaming.tv, have also achieved a strong footing in their home markets. For instance, Huya.com is one of the key companies in China, offering a live streaming platform for streaming video games and esports events.

"Market Study Report 2020"

In terms of end-user, the live streaming platform is being extensively used by esports organizers, music concert organizers, and educational institutions. Large music concerts in June 2020 are going to be streamed live to be viewed by music enthusiasts over various devices. Similarly, sports event like Bundesliga (a football league) that is currently being streamed live on various platforms like Hotstar are exclusively being viewed online due to nationwide lockdowns across the globe.

Global Live Streaming Market is expected to reach USD 247,275 Million by 2027 at a CAGR of 28.1% during the forecast period.

The global live streaming market can reach a size of USD 247,275 million by 2027.

The global live streaming market is expected to exhibit a CAGR of 28.1% from 2019 to 2027.

Media & entertainment, education, and esports are the biggest end-users of the global live streaming market.

Empire Video Productions, LLC, Facebook, Inc., AfreecaTV Co., Ltd., EventStreaming.TV, Huya, Inc., Dacast, Google, Inc., Amazon.com, Inc., IBM Corporation, Microsoft Corporation, Streaming.hr, Twitch Interactive, Inc., Periscope, Vimeo, Instagram, Inc., and Flux Broadcast are key players of the global live streaming market.

"Market Study Report 2020"

Live Streaming Market Segmentation by Types:

Laptops and Desktops

Smartphones and Tablets

Smart TV

Gaming Consoles

Live Streaming Market Segmentation by Applications:

Media

Telecommunication

BFSI

Education

Healthcare

Government

Others

"Market Study Report 2020"

Video Downloads (EST)

Revenue in the Video Downloads (EST) segment is projected to reach US$4,684m in 2020.

Revenue is expected to show an annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2025) of 1.7%, resulting in a projected market volume of US$5,103m by 2025.

User penetration will be 9.7% in 2020 and is expected to hit 11.0% by 2025.

The average revenue per user (ARPU) is expected to amount to US$6.50.

In global comparison, most revenue will be generated in the United States (US$1,910m in 2020).

"Statista 2020"

What We Need & What You Get

Broken down for you folks in more detail:

How much funding we need and where it's going. 

We need US$ 800 000 to install the cloud gaming upgrade and to upgrade current platform to cater for hundreds of millions of esports enthusiasts and streamers and different content owners creating their own channels. 

Some unique perks you will get for backing us. Hope you will be excited!

As part of your perks you will be able to get free access to our BETA platform and give us input on where you think we can improve before we go in August.

You will also be able to buy advertising space for a bargain on the platform put aside especially for early backers, where as advertisers joining after the platform launch will pay top dollar for the spaces when the platform goes live. There will be Platinium ad space, Gold Add space and Silver Add Space.

Early backers will get special badges on their platform accounts to show they assisted in making the platform a reality.

Early backers will also get free access to specific channels with paid for premium content 

Where does the funds go if we don't reach your entire goal?

If we don't reach our goal we need to build the platform as far as we possibly could 

The Impact

More explanation about your campaign also about the difference your contribution will make:

Explanation of why our project is valuable to you the contributor and to the world.

Cloud gaming is the fast growing sector in video streaming and we will cater for that. More objective views are also needed in the digital media world and our news will be backed by hard core journalistic views based on facts and not trying to form the viewers opinion via FAKE NEWS. We will show an interesting viewpoint to the world and provide end users a happy safe digital space. We will provide content creators all over the world with a brilliant product to share and monetise and broadcast their content live. We will additionally launch an additional esports cloud gaming platform with 600 games.

Our successful track record with projects like these

We have broadcasted several big events like Women's World Cup of Golf, Davis Cup, Music awards etc and some of the biggest broadcasters in the world are using technologies I sold to them. But now its time to build this company and contribute something positive and exciting to the world :-)

We want to make it real for people and build trust.

Everyone needs a safe objective digital space but they also want to listen to objective viewpoints.

Risks & Challenges

I know that you value our transparency. Some insights into the risks and obstacles we may face on the way to achieving your goal.

What qualifies us to overcome these hurdles.

Challenges are to secure content and personal information of end users, we are confident that we can provide end users and content owners peace of mind when it comes to security of data and protection of content. We have already sourced all the necessary tech and infrastructure in order to protect users against data breaches and content owners against illegal downloads and distribution.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

If you have specific skills in the video streaming, online advertising industry & social media etc please send us your details (CV) as we might need you much sooner rather than later :-) 

Please get the word out and make some noise about this new platform and campaign.

Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it !!
story_txt: Short SummaryI think contributors will fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Introduction of myself and my background.My Name is Dries Prinsloo and I have 20 Years Experience in New Media (Mobile & Internet) Content and Content Rights Brokering, New Media (Video Streaming Platforms for Mobile and the Internet) Digital Platforms and Digital Strategies. and i am 48 years old.A Brief description of our campaign and why it's important to us.The magnitude of what contributors will help us achieve.WITH THESE KINDS OF PROJECTED GROWTH GLOBALLY THERE ARE MORE THAN ENOUGH SPACE FOR AN ALTERNATIVE : ALL NEW VIDEO, PHOTO & OBJECTIVE SOCIAL NETWORKING PLATFORM.The Global Video Streaming Market, valued at USD 42.14 Billion in the year 2019 has been witnessing unprecedented growth in the last few years on the back of increasing internet penetration, escalating number of smartphone users and rising investment in good content.Additionally, increasing technology in digital media and lockdown across regions and countries as a result of Covid-19 pandemic will drive the Video Streaming market value in the near future.Traditional media companies and the streaming video on demand platforms like Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon Prime are competing for the best quality content to stream on their platforms and grow their subscriber base and the pandemic has provided an opportunity to these companies to leverage the discretionary spend of the consumers. Among the Streaming Type of the Video Streaming market (Video on Demand and Live), Video on Demand has been gaining popularity globally and is expected to keep growing in the forecast period. "Market Study Report"The demand of VOD in Video Streaming is due to demand of watching videos according to their choice which will keep increasing in future. Among the Revenue Model of the Video Streaming market (AVOD, TVOD and SVOD), SVOD has been gaining popularity globally and is expected to keep growing in the forecast period. The demand of SVOD in Video Streaming is due to its availability anytime and higher revenue generating type which will keep increasing in future. Among the End User of the Video Streaming market (Media and Entertainment, Education and Awareness, IT and E- commerce, Others), Media and Entertainment is highly popular globally and is expected to keep growing in the forecast period. We have already sourced all the necessary tech and infrastructure in order to protect users against data breaches and content owners against illegal downloads and distribution.Other Ways You Can HelpI understand Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:If you have specific skills in the video streaming, online advertising industry & social media etc please send us your details (CV) as we might need you much sooner rather than later :-) Please get the word out and make some noise about this new platform and campaign.Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!And that's all there is to it !!

story:
Short Summary

 We are six young teenagers who are looking to prosper in the field of talk shows by doing what we like the most: playing games and entertaining people.

 We want to start a gaming related podcast to cover the latest news and to improve the overall quality of the gaming industry. We would love it if our idea comes through.

 We are thinking of creating an extensive coverage of all sorts of games in order to develop the gaming in our country. We will cover news around CS:GO, League of Legends, Fifa18, PUBG etc. Broadcasting many major tournaments, interviews with Youtubers & Streamers, talking about new games and showing them to the viewers, reviews of tech like PC parts, peripherals, and all sort of gear, playing games with viewers, are things that we will do. For now, we have partnership with one of the oldest gaming organisations in the world - Dreamhack - for casting their tournaments. We are also partnering with one bulgarian organisation - ESPORTS Bulgaria. We can make a lot of content if we receive the amount of money, because all we need is studio and some equipment.  Our team isnt big but we believe in our idea and we will try our best to realize it.

What We Need & What You Get

 Since we are young we are limited to the resources we can spend so we are looking for financial support in order to achieve our idea. We need the money for renting a studio and for buying the equipment required. This involves cameras, microphones, lighting and a computer to broadcast the show.

 Each person who wants to be part of Team Hexa by funding our idea can get one of our unique perks which involve a lot of merchandise. With backing us you will be part of our family.

 If we do not reach our goal will try to make it work with the few things we have got available. We are very eager to succeed so failure is not an option.

The Impact

 Our country needs improvement in gaming and esports industy. With our idea we can make it larger and more popular. 

We believe our idea is also something that could contribute to the development of the gaming industry in the world.

Risks & Challenges

We are very persistent and we do not back down when an obstacle appears. We work together and we always figure out a solution to our problem. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would be very appreciative if you help us reach our goal and if you find our idea interesting. If you cant help us with donating money but you have idea how you can help, you can always reach us on our email. Do not forget to share it with your friends.

story:
Short Summary

What happens when the worst private eye in the world and the best detective inspector at the SFPD team up?  

Everything going wrong.  In a good way.  

But hey, it's the 1940's so grab a sarsaparilla, kick back, and enjoy the ride!   

This story is an upbeat audio drama that follows the misadventures of Dalton: an angry human Pomeranian who runs on soda and spite and Gino Rosetti, God's Italian gift to women and crime fighting. 

Together, they team up and go on the weirdest misadventures while learning how to be friends along the way.   If you're a fan of Sherlock Holmes and character driven comedies, this story is for you! 

 

About the Creator

Bonjour ya'll! I'm an artist and writer specializing in dramatic feel-good stories with strange lovable characters.

I specialize in writing witty comedic drama, bromance, and feel good angst. When I'm not wearing my artist's hat, I like to make extra delicious key lime pie, read the Bible, collect white pebbles on the beach, and remind my dogs about how pretty they are.

This year, I wrote the first season (six thirty-minute episodes) of my first ever audio drama: Detectives for Hire.  

 

What We Need

$1,480 is all we need to fund episode one!  This sweet, sweet cabbage will pay for…

$180 per lead role (and roles with an equal amount of lines as the leads)

Episode 1: Dalton and Gino = $360

$50 per supporting role 

Episode 1: Octavia, Pierce, Emery, Clara = $200

$25 per minor role 

Episode 1: Narrator, Mr. Chen, Winterson, Cooper, Stiles, Daisy May = $150

Story Consultant: $100

Sound Engineer/Theme Music Composer = $200

Writer/Director = $200

IndieGoGo’s 5% fee = $70

The remaining $200 will go towards creating a website for the series and maintaining it.  This will provide a space to promote the series, host all the art, episodes, blogging, and bonus content! 

 

Why 

All of the amazingly talented people I’ve had the pleasure to meet and collaborate with since I began the casting call on July 1st have volunteered their time, talent, and passion for nothing in return except seeing this project come to life.  

I love and appreciate them dearly for it and I want to compensate everyone for their time and talent AND build towards making this project sustainable in the long term so I can spend more time producing, directing, writing, and drawing this incredibly fun series.

With funding, I can not only afford to pay my actors and crew, but also create and host the website for all things Detectives for Hire related so you never miss a thing! 

 

What You Get/Rewards/Perks

Become a Junior Detective for $1 or more and get access to the Detectives for Hire Discord where you can see behind the scenes content and get more updates as the series comes together.

Upgrade to a Rookie Private Investigator for $5 or more!  This will give you access to the Detectives for Hire Discord server AND let you listen to the audio drama debut before anyone else with a patron-only livestream! 

Get promoted to Seasoned Detective for $10 or more!  This will give you access to the Discord channel, listening to the episode with an exclusive patron-only livestream debut AND exclusive access to a behind the scenes Q and A livestream!

 

Stretch Goals

$1,800

This will enable me to draw 7 full color illustrations to accompany the key scenes of the episode and upload the illustrated episode to Youtube.  All of the art is done by yours truly.  

$2,100

Oh wowee.  With this kind dough we can rally the troops to record pep talks as the characters to get your day started on a high note or encourage you when you’ve had a rough day!

$3,320

We can fund episode 2 and get that started right after episode 1!  

 

In case we raise less than $1,480…

Thank you for all your generosity!  

We are still forging ahead and making episode 1 with whatever is raised with joy and zeal!  

 

The Impact

There is no shortage of cynical, dark, and otherwise gritty stories to pick from.  So I’d like to balance out the scales a bit by bringing you something fun, light-filled, and heart wrenching to make you smile and get lost in at the end of a long day or while you’re cleaning the house, waiting in traffic, or just looking for a little pick me up.  

I had so much fun writing this series and have been extremely blessed to have so many wonderful actors who are bringing these characters to life and recording their lines as we speak!  

This is something really special and I’d love for you to be a part of it.  Everyone involved is giving it their all and we want to share the fruits of our labor with you, future listener!

Every dollar you give goes to supporting not only the audio drama, but everything else it represents:

* Fun characters that radiate kindness and positive vibes 

* Top-notch storytelling

* Wholesome content 

* The power to create the episodes at a regular pace

 

Risks & Challenges

In all honesty, there is no risk!  Every dollar raised will go to supporting everyone involved and enable us to pour in the extra time and consistency that is possible from doing a paid project! 

The only challenge right now is casting and recording with the actor who will be cast as Gino so we can release episode 1 on October 31st of this year!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If money is tight right now, firstly, THANK YOU for reading all the way through the end! 

Second, it would help us more than you can possibly imagine if you spread the word!  Tell your friends, post on social, or use Indiegogo’s share tools. 

Let’s get as many eyes on this as possible!

 

Episode Premiere Date

October 31st, 2020! 

 

Audition for Gino Rosetti

https://www.castingcall.club/projects/detective...

https://www.behindthevoiceactors.com/members/Sm...

story: Hello, I'm Jeremy Cummings and I started the podcast called Cummings is Culture and when I started this journey I personally never expected it would land here. I started the podcast to have fun, talk to people I always thought were interesting, and to inform people of things they may not know and to convince them to do their own research. But after the events of January 6'th, I've realized that our country needs honesty, integrity, and overall good journalism. So I'm on the mission to do just that and you can help me by donating to this today. I know times are tough but we are tougher. When you decide to help Cummings is Culture grow and expand by making this donation you will be helping not just me and this brand, but you will be helping this country. Cummings is Culture is dedicated to expose the ones who take advantage of American families, American Workers, and the overall population as a whole. We will do this honestly and fairly we will not be one sided because that is what divides us. Furthermore we will always be honest to you because you deserve it we all do! What we are doing is creating a media outlet starting here with the live video content of CultureCast as we like to call it, this will integrate us on every major platform out their as a live content provider. CultureCast will be the launching point for the news network that we will create. TOGETHER because I cannot do this without you this will be essential in providing conversations with people from different ideologies to prove that we are all not that different. There is no risk in this business besides coming together and ending the narratives that the media has used to divide us even more, we will accomplish this together because that's not controversial, It's Just CULTURE! What we need the money for, number one is better equipment and to buy 4K high definition cameras and to build an actual studio with television quality equipment. Our goal is to have a channel on YouTube TV and I know we can achieve it we will be bringing you different shows from across the country through the power of the internet!

story:
Quienes somos

Hola, somos Maiah y Gabriel, los dos loquitos que desde hace un año hacen No sé, dime tú, un podcast en español para todos aquellos que alguna vez han sentido que no pertenecen.

Todas las semanas nos escuchas desde Colombia, España, Chile, Argentina, Perú, Ecuador, Costa Rica, Cuba, Puerto Rico, Panamá, Canadá, México, Inglaterra, China, Italia, Francia, Estados Unidos y hasta en Bakú, Azerbaijan.

Si no nos conoces 

Lo puedes escuchar completico aquí.

O suscribirte en iTunes.

O seguirlo en Spotify.

O verlo cada semana en wedontbelong,com.

Tenemos un año y más de 50 episodios haciéndolo.

Ahora estamos aquí para que nos ayudes a conocerte en persona.

Para eso inventamos el No sé, dime tour.

Y queremos pasar por la hermosa ciudad de Medellín, en Colombia.

Qué es el No sé, dime tour MEDELLÍN

Agarrar nuestras maletas para ir a Medellín, encontrar un teatro para grabar en vivo nuestro podcast contigo muerto de risa en el público, invitar a un "salmón" famoso de Colombia para que se siente con nosotros (si no has escuchado el podcast, no sabes qué es un "salmón"... ¡cambia eso de ti!) y nos deje entrevistarlo para que nos cuente por qué también siente que no pertenece, documentar todo nuestro viaje con un equipo de profesionales audiovisuales de cada ciudad y convertir nuestro pequeño podcast casero en un programa de TV de verdad en el que los protagonistas son los #superdiamantes que nos escuchan en todo el mundo.

Cómo queremos hacerlo

Hacer un programa como este es súper ambicioso. No solo tienes que invertir en la producción del evento, en los pasajes, en el alojamiento, sino también en trabajar con un equipo de profesionales con la experiencia suficiente para garantizar que el resultado final no tenga nada que envidiarle a programas que puedes ver en lugares como Netflix o HBO.

A lo mejor no lo sabes, pero un sólo episodio de un programa así puede llegar a costar cientos de miles de dólares en el mundo real.

Por qué nosotros

Si nos conoces sabes que desde hace años hemos desarrollado proyectos para Youtube, Facebook, Instagram, Snap Inc, Batanga Media, AOL, Microsoft, HLN, Univision, Discovery, NBC Universo, Mitú, Fullscreen, Clevver TV, Broadway Video y marcas como McDonalds, Bud Light, AT&T, Volvo, Ford, Covergirl, Makeup Forever, Best Buy, Target, Google, Johnny Walker, entre muchas otras.

Parte de las cosas que hemos hecho las puedes encontrar aquí. 

Juntos hemos estado nominados a los Streamy Awards 3 veces (más veces que cualquier creador Latino)

 

a los Shorty Awards...

Y hasta teníamos nuestra sección en un noticiero todas las semanas.

Luego creamos este podcast y han hablado de él en E! Entertainment Television, en Radio Caracol, en CNN y hasta nos metieron en la lista de los podcast que definitivament deberías escuchar de la revista Latina.

Pero nada de eso importa tanto como que tú lo veas y escuches cada semana.

Por eso esto queremos llevarlo a otro nivel y hacerlo teniendo control del proyecto y dejando que seas tú mismo quién está detrás de esto.

Queremos algo de superdiamantes para superdiamantes.

Y aunque nosotros somos buenos consiguiendo ayuda y haciendo que cosas de ultra bajo presupuesto se vean bien, aún así necesitamos un monto mínimo para poder llevar el No sé, dime tour a cada país.

No hacemos esto para hacernos millonarios, pero sí creemos que con tu ayuda podríamos hacer algo que nos gusta a nosotros y a ti por muchísimos años más.

El problema

Montar esta producción tiene costos operativos importantes.

Desde conseguir el teatro hasta conseguir alojamiento, los pasajes, grabar, editar todo para que esté al nivel de un programa de televisión...

Así que si vamos a hacerlo, vamos a hacerlo bien y repetir esto en todos los países que podamos.

Pero si nuestros superdiamantes de Medellín nos han dicho la verdad, no sólo podemos hacer esto sino cualquier cosa.

Tenemos en ustedes todo lo que hace falta para lograrlo. 

Y lo mejor es que podremos seguir escribiendo el libro que lees semana a semana en wedontbelong,com y podemos seguir grabando series como One Girl Show y seguir luchando por nuestros sueños locos en Hollywood.

Lo que nos hace falta

  • Al menos 400 superdiamantes en cada ciudad  que compren una entrada a un precio súper asequible.
  • Recaudar con la venta de esas entradas al menos $20,000 para ir a Medellín.
  • Utilizar parte de ese dinero para producir un evento genial y convertirlo en un episodio de nuestro programa.
  • Usar el resto para seguir haciendo el podcast y todo nuestro contenido cada semana.

Cómo lo utilizaremos

  • Alquiler del Teatro (entre 30% y 50% de lo recaudado)
  • Merch
  • Logística (Alojamiento, pasajes, transporte, comidas)
  • Alquiler de equipos
  • Honorarios de producción
  • Mercadeo de la gira

Lo que ofrecemos

Además de entradas para que nos acompañes a dejar el corazón en un teatro de la hermosa ciudad de Medellín en un show que tú mismo crearás con nosotros, tenemos perks para superdiamantes que quieran y puedan contribuir con un poquito más para obtener desde cosas súper especiales como franelas que sólo van a estás disponibles si hacemos el tour, estar en los créditos de la serie como productores, o hasta ser invitados especiales en un podcast con nosotros (¡la pizza corre por nuestra cuenta!).

Por qué te necesitamos

Hemos estado haciendo encuestas. Sé qué nos hemos puesto fastidiosos, pero necesitamos estar 100% seguros de que en las ciudades a las que vamos hay suficientes de ustedes para hacer esto.  

Te necesitamos porque no sólo no tenemos dinero para pagar la gira de nuestro bolsillo, sino porque si no logramos que esta gira pase hay muchísimas cosas que muy probable tendremos que también dejar de hacer.

El reto

Queremos arrancar la gira oficialmente después del 15 de Septiembre, por lo que necesitamos producir todo durante el verano. Por eso debemos recaudar el dinero de cada ciudad en sólo 10 días. De esta forma podemos hacer esta misma campaña en las siguiente ciudad hasta completar todas las que podamos comprometernos a visitar este año.

La idea es comenzar con una ciudad y si logramos la meta, hacer otra y otra y otra hasta que podamos llegar a la mayor cantidad de ciudades posibles.

Como ves, estamos apostándolo todo a esto.

Esto es lo que queremos: si logramos hacer al menos 5 ciudades podemos seguir haciendo el podcast.

Si no, tendremos que cancelar todo.

Tal vez no vives en Medellín, pero conoces a alguien que vive en Medellín y que crees que puede gustarle nuestro podcast, pues mándale esta campaña para que vaya por tí.

Luego, cuando le toque a tu ciudad ya sabes lo que tienes que hacer.

Y así hasta que los superdiamantes conquistemos el mundo.

¿Contamos contigo?

Maiah y Gabriel

A lo mejor no lo sabes, pero un sólo episodio de un programa así puede llegar a costar cientos de miles de dólares en el mundo real.
Por qué nosotros
Si nos conoces sabes que desde hace años hemos desarrollado proyectos para Youtube, Facebook, Instagram, Snap Inc, Batanga Media, AOL, Microsoft, HLN, Univision, Discovery, NBC Universo, Mitú, Fullscreen, Clevver TV, Broadway Video y marcas como McDonalds, Bud Light, AT&T, Volvo, Ford, Covergirl, Makeup Forever, Best Buy, Target, Google, Johnny Walker, entre muchas otras.
Parte de las cosas que hemos hecho las puedes encontrar aquí. 
Juntos hemos estado nominados a los Streamy Awards 3 veces (más veces que cualquier creador Latino)

 
a los Shorty Awards...
Y hasta teníamos nuestra sección en un noticiero todas las semanas.
Luego creamos este podcast y han hablado de él en E! Entertainment Television, en Radio Caracol, en CNN y hasta nos metieron en la lista de los podcast que definitivament deberías escuchar de la revista Latina.
Pero nada de eso importa tanto como que tú lo veas y escuches cada semana.
Por eso esto queremos llevarlo a otro nivel y hacerlo teniendo control del proyecto y dejando que seas tú mismo quién está detrás de esto.
Queremos algo de superdiamantes para superdiamantes.
Y aunque nosotros somos buenos consiguiendo ayuda y haciendo que cosas de ultra bajo presupuesto se vean bien, aún así necesitamos un monto mínimo para poder llevar el No sé, dime tour a cada país.
No hacemos esto para hacernos millonarios, pero sí creemos que con tu ayuda podríamos hacer algo que nos gusta a nosotros y a ti por muchísimos años más.
El problema
Montar esta producción tiene costos operativos importantes.
Desde conseguir el teatro hasta conseguir alojamiento, los pasajes, grabar, editar todo para que esté al nivel de un programa de televisión...
Así que si vamos a hacerlo, vamos a hacerlo bien y repetir esto en todos los países que podamos.
Pero si nuestros superdiamantes de Medellín nos han dicho la verdad, no sólo podemos hacer esto sino cualquier cosa.
Tenemos en ustedes todo lo que hace falta para lograrlo. 
Y lo mejor es que podremos seguir escribiendo el libro que lees semana a semana en wedontbelong,com y podemos seguir grabando series como One Girl Show y seguir luchando por nuestros sueños locos en Hollywood.
Lo que nos hace falta

Al menos 400 superdiamantes en cada ciudad  que compren una entrada a un precio súper asequible.
Recaudar con la venta de esas entradas al menos $20,000 para ir a Medellín.
Utilizar parte de ese dinero para producir un evento genial y convertirlo en un episodio de nuestro programa.
Usar el resto para seguir haciendo el podcast y todo nuestro contenido cada semana.

Cómo lo utilizaremos

Alquiler del Teatro (entre 30% y 50% de lo recaudado)
Merch
Logística (Alojamiento, pasajes, transporte, comidas)
Alquiler de equipos
Honorarios de producción
Mercadeo de la gira

Lo que ofrecemos
Además de entradas para que nos acompañes a dejar el corazón en un teatro de la hermosa ciudad de Medellín en un show que tú mismo crearás con nosotros, tenemos perks para superdiamantes que quieran y puedan contribuir con un poquito más para obtener desde cosas súper especiales como franelas que sólo van a estás disponibles si hacemos el tour, estar en los créditos de la serie como productores, o hasta ser invitados especiales en un podcast con nosotros (¡la pizza corre por nuestra cuenta!).
Por qué te necesitamos
Hemos estado haciendo encuestas. Sé qué nos hemos puesto fastidiosos, pero necesitamos estar 100% seguros de que en las ciudades a las que vamos hay suficientes de ustedes para hacer esto.  
Te necesitamos porque no sólo no tenemos dinero para pagar la gira de nuestro bolsillo, sino porque si no logramos que esta gira pase hay muchísimas cosas que muy probable tendremos que también dejar de hacer.
El reto
Queremos arrancar la gira oficialmente después del 15 de Septiembre, por lo que necesitamos producir todo durante el verano. Por eso debemos recaudar el dinero de cada ciudad en sólo 10 días. De esta forma podemos hacer esta misma campaña en las siguiente ciudad hasta completar todas las que podamos comprometernos a visitar este año.
La idea es comenzar con una ciudad y si logramos la meta, hacer otra y otra y otra hasta que podamos llegar a la mayor cantidad de ciudades posibles.
Como ves, estamos apostándolo todo a esto.
Esto es lo que queremos: si logramos hacer al menos 5 ciudades podemos seguir haciendo el podcast.
Si no, tendremos que cancelar todo.
Tal vez no vives en Medellín, pero conoces a alguien que vive en Medellín y que crees que puede gustarle nuestro podcast, pues mándale esta campaña para que vaya por tí.
Luego, cuando le toque a tu ciudad ya sabes lo que tienes que hacer.
Y así hasta que los superdiamantes conquistemos el mundo.
¿Contamos contigo?
Maiah y Gabriel

story:
Each nation in the world holds its own unique musical tradition, polished and refined by thousands and thousands of years. Entire universities are into studying this legacy our forefathers gave us. The science and the technologies develop progressively, but when it comes to the finest strings of our souls, we do not look forward but gaze inside ourselves, a place where the integral part of our essence is, our roots. Now, just as before, they carry their genetic code. Just as the music itself: even before it became classics, jazz or techno, it has always been a very special instrument, a separate language for the human soul. Our page is dedicated to the merging and intertwining of the traditional cultures of the world and the modern electronic and dance scene. We are interested in drawing wide attention to the modern ethnical music and making it popular. We are constantly at search of new names, musicians and corresponding events. If you have something to say that relates to the issue, please kindly contact us to place the information about your event.

 

      2 years ago, with my colleagues, I created a page in which we want to sanctify all the news related to ethnic music and art. It is called the Kiev Ethno Foundation. After 2 years, only I remained in the page management. No, the desire to integrate all fans of ethnic people has not gone away. But the situation in the country is such that none of the editors want to work for free. Summer is coming, I have plans to hold a party in Kiev and other cities of Ukraine. It also takes a little money. To date, we have a Facebook page with 735 subscribers. And the soundcloud page with 1300 subscribers. There are cool exclusive podcasts from artists like Que Sakamoto (Japan), Jose Manuel (France), Javier Cansinos (Spain), Kosa (India) and more other.

 

Ukraine is rising from its knees, we are becoming part of the European society and want to develop our culture. Help us with this. Since our mission is not commercial - to find sponsors is not realistic, that's why we appeal to you, help us.

 

what we need money for:

1. Pay for a year account on the soundcloud
2. Salary to editors of our Facebook page.
3. One-time salary SMM manager for raising the page.
4. Money for a promo party.

story:
Quick FAQ :

How to donate? - Click on the "Back It" button near the top of the page. This will lead you to another page that will ask for your donation amount and form of payment. 

Donor Hall Of Fame? - All donors will be entered into our "Donor Hall Of Fame." This will be promoted on our social media, website and also displayed in our station headquarters for everyone to see. 

What are Perks? - Perks are another way you can donate to our campaign. Perks allow us to give you a little something extra for helping us out. Also, we have some cool perks with signed memorabilia from our amazing friends who support our vision. Perks are located on the right side of the page.

How can I share? - Use the Facebook and Twitter icons on the right side of the page, under the funding timeline and to the right of the Follow button. This will create a post about NEWHD's campaign that you can share with your friends and followers on social media. 

Do you want to learn more about us? Continue scrolling down to learn more about who we are, why we need funding and to meet our awesome sponsors/partners who believe in what we are trying to achieve.

story:
Who are you again?

Well I'm (Wookiee)Mark, and I stream on Twitch. I'm on the lesser known, smaller side of Twitch known as Twitch Creative. I make stuff! I yell about politics! It's fun I swear!

I used to work in corporate IT for a pretty good salary, but a few years ago I had a series of really bad grand mal seizures and now I've got a traumatic brain injury. Fun, right? Despite over two years' of job applications, interviews, buying new ties... I've been unable to return to my field.

Lucky for me, my Twitch channel is growing! Just... really slowly. Really really slowly. Too slow to catch up on our housing expense.

Your help growing my channel might be just what I need to turn my channel from a hobby endeavor to a viable business for me, and then my family won't be homeless. Sweet, right?

What I need, and what you get.

I'm trying to raise about $1200. It's a pretty modest amount I think, but it's one I can't possibly come up with while unemployed. We're not making rent (really, mortgage payments) right now as it is even though my wife is working full time at a really dangerous job.

ALL of this funding will go to upgrading my computer equipment for my livestream so that I can add gaming content and possibly 3D modeling (for printing) content to my stream. My current setup can barely run OBS and get me on Twitch. It's reliable and good, but trying to run Tetris on there is going to make it melt, seriously. If I raise my goal, I'll be able to get a nice sturdy quad core i7 based tower that will run just about anything I want to throw at it and give my stream not just new content, but longevity. I won't have to worry about upgrading for a good while, so I'll have time to grow.

If I only get part of my goal I'll buy some lesser machine that will do the job, but it may not last as long or go as far, you know? Still, everything helps.

What do you get out of it? The smug satisfaction of helping a poor bastard like me possibly get back on his feet, that's good right?

Also if you donate at least $50 I'll add your name to the SEVERED C3PO HEAD! (You can also get on the head by subscribing to my Twitch channel for 9 months at https://www.twitch.tv/wookieemark). You can choose any name or handle you want if you haven't got a Twitch ID (or even if you do!)

What does this mean to you?

This could literally save my family's home. We're in dire straits right now. We've had ENORMOUS success on GoFundMe for the past 9 months and that's kept us in our house, but that funding is about to run out. We met our goal of raising enough to keep the mortgage paid "for a year" (really about 9 months after fees) and even with all of that help, it wasn't enough time for me to find a job again. It's pretty rough out there for a 41 year old disabled dude with a brain injury and a broken back, you guys. 

We've got two daughters, one who's in college right now to be a social worker and commuting from home to save money. She needs us to keep this place so that she can reach her goals. We've got an 8 year old who might be 9 by the time you read this, because that's real soon. She's homeschooled, sharp as a tack, the kindest kid you've ever met, and she's been on my stream once or twice. She's great. She grew up here, she's lived here her whole life. I'm fighting like hell to make sure she can stay here.

Risks & Challenges

Well the risk is that I raise the money, expand my content, and... I flop. Twitch is a big pond. I'm on the Creative side right now partly because I haven't got the equipment for gaming there and partly because I just love making stuff! I'll still make stuff and stream it even if this campaign doesn't succeed! But it's extremely hard, nearly impossible, to reach a sustainable revenue on Twitch Creative. It's on Gaming where people are making a living from it.

It's hard to stand out. I'm good at standing out though. I'm a loudmouth, a pain in the ass, and I entertain people sometimes despite themselves. I think that with expanded content and streaming hours, I can climb the ladder. I just need your help to get on the first rung you guys.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You can come watch my stream on Twitch! I'm WookieeMark, do a search or visit https://www.twitch.tv/wookieemark
  • You can get the word out. Do you know somebody generous who might want to help? Awesome! Do you know somebody who wants to see me make a wookiee mask out of a mass of loose hair? Awesome!! Tell those people!
  • You can share this campaign on social media
  • You can subscribe to my channel on Twitch, throw some bits, talk about me in other channels (within reason, don't disrupt anybody's stream) and stuff like that!

Thanks for reading!

story:
Who Am I

Sharing with you my truth - I'm ashamed, I'm a wanderer. Searching for myself. 

Living with Bipolar, Anxiety Disorder, OCD, and CPTSD.  It was only through my latest diagnosis in 2019 that I am able to have a better understanding of my irrational behavior and thoughts, and unexplainable moods throughout my life despite seeking therapy for the past 12 years. My   I am a mom to 3 beautiful young children, and I want to contribute to the society they will live in that they can grow in and to provide a platform for people to turn too. A place of support for you and me. 

Where I Began

When I started Searching Her, I lost my confidence as I had a lot of self doubt. Thinking that what I do would not matter or be able to create any impact in someone's life. Finances were also a huge concern having a family to feed. Youtube was challenging because i couldn't gather my thoughts constantly, talking to a camera was also daunting. There was that missing connection i couldn't feel behind a screen.

How It Started

When I first knew about Live Streaming, I thought to myself this could be an opportunity. Without thinking much I created an account on that very same day. Watching tutorials night after night, doing the setting up was not an easy feat. I started talking to people on the platform as I was very lonely, and was looking for just some company to chat with. 

Little did i expect that I would meet many people who are going through similar situations/experiences like myself. And that was when I said, I'm not giving up anymore. Simply because there were so many people out there who did not have an avenue to turn too. And we are all in our dark deepest corners, going through the motion of life and NOT LIVING. Having to catch up with society and what and how media portrays in normalized. We lost touch with our inner soul. 

Least to my surprise,I made to Affiliation Programme of a streaming platform called Twitch Twitch.tv after 6 days which was a huge accomplishment for me, something i dare not even dream about since everyone else was mostly about gaming and Vlogging.

Many people actually started coming forward to express the struggles they were going through when I was live. Many who felt rejected, depressed, and isolated from the society norms. And that was another reason I kept on fighting my personal struggles and conditions.

To my surprise, the act of giving, the act of kindness, the act of listening with a heart, could possibly change not just 1 but many peoples life, because they found a sense of belonging and they found the support they have been searching for. Not only have they received grace but they came back even when they were in better conditions to share the  grace, love, kindness and support they received to the others who are now in need now.

Your Impact

I am not a certified therapist nor a psychologist. But what makes it so special is that people have found a thriving community with so much love and warmth. That people did not need to hide how they truly feel and conceal who they really are behind the screen whilst still having genuine frienships as they go along the way. That itself is indescribable. The simple tools of life of a human being which doesn't cost you anything was all that someone needs to get the hope and strength to grow through their daily life battles one step at a time. 

This is not to replace professional help especially for people who have Mental Disorders. But rather to be a bridge for people who are in distress or new to Mental Health. To allow and encourage people to step forward with courage in their own space and comfort. In order for them to seek professional help. And along the way continue their jouney together in the world of humanity. 

Scoiety these days has spoken too little about our mental health when our mental health should be a top priority. Think of it this way, a human being needs a heart and a brain to function. Without either, there will be nothing left of us but a souless body. 

I sincerely hope to make an impact by empowering others with their story and a meaningful purpose for their lives amidst the struggles they are going through.  Please hear me out further.

Everyone deserves to be heard and have a chance at life no matter the lemons that it gives you. 

With good support and opportunities given to people the power of healing oneself by helping others is rewarding. 

On a side note, I share my family reality life in real-time when the kids are at home with my viewers, as unconventional it may seem. For a start whatever I have started is unconventional of its own. I don't have an explanation for this entire family reality which i do except, A genuine heart. It was a tough decison as exposing my family was a risk that we decided to take. - When my viewers tell me, look, that is warmth i've never got to experience in my life. It makes my heart so full to know that such a risk/decision I made could also be shared with someone else across the world.

 I go through my mental conditions every day, my spouse also suffers from PTSD, Depression, Alcohol Addiction, Anxiety Disorder and Agoraophia due to childhood and being in the military for over 10 years. (Left Military Now) . 

Secondly, whether you have a mental health illness or disorder, that doesn't mean you don't and can't deserve to have a family. It is possible to have  a family, It is possible for you to find someone who will love you and accept you for who you are. It is possible for you to have kids, and that you are and will be enough for your children. Whether you choose to have kids naturally or via adoption. The Key is - That should not bar you from thinking that you do not and will never be able to have a family of your own. 

Finances

Here I will explain to you what the finances/plans are

Hoping to raise SGD$20,000 inclusive of the deduction fees. 

1. Equipment such as a camera, webcam, lightings etc through better quality content, talk shows and podcast for viewers help bridge this big gap by normalizing mental health issues and potentially save lives that are suffering in silence.

2. Advertsing to Support Groups that enables me to carry on with this project. and to be able to reach more people in dire need. ( So many people on support groups that I have seen, have not benefited from it and that the community is toxic and that is extremly disheartening to see and hear of) 

3. Twitch is just a platform I'm using as it's free. I'm looking into going in Youtube fully so that people may also watch at their own convenience, space and comfort especially for people who have not been able to overcome the stigma of getting judged as well. Everything takes time and we can be that positive aid to help someone take the first step. 

4. Website Service + Software for both streaming and Video Editing required for me to continue what i'm doing for both live streams and Youtube.

5. Reaching Out to Organizations once everything is set in place I'm looking at about 3 to 6 months for me to pitch and propose so that we can extend this platform and idea to create more awareness and also avenue for people. 

6. Talk Shows with Professionals, Ground Level Individuals to share their experiences and professional advice as deemed. (Informative level)

7. A FREE mobile app creator -  on a bigger spectrum solely for outreach support in real-time with both volunteers and professionals, podcast, provide live chats with viewers, meditation groups, counselors, psychologist and therapist.

8. A book at the end of this journey about my life story and how searching her came about. And about how, anyone in this world have a choice to do something positive no matter how trival it maybe. Because each of us, are a contributing factor to the human race and world. Incorporated with other mental health suffers short stories. 

In order for the community to thrive and for me to be able to execute the plans, I need to ask for funding as I am unfit to work due to my condition, and my spouse and i have dedicated our life, and family for this cause even before creating this funding. It is only with the community that is in the current support group that enables me to carry on with this project. And with your help to fund the project will we be able to reach out to more people in dire need. 

We are all aware that coming out to speak about Mental Health and to seek help is very scary and exhausting not knowing where to go too, or for many cases, people cannot afford to seek therapy as it is too costly. If everyone contributes a little in their own way, whether it's through finances or by offering volunteer support or even spreading word of the campaign. Many lives could change, this itself can give many people the hope and courgae in the midst of darkness whether it's Mental Health-Related or Not. 

Lastly, If this project does not reach its funding goal, the finances would then be used for the smaller scales projects, for eg: equipment, software, reaching out to organisations, marketing.

Risks & Challenges

The completion of the project would be tentative as it is ongoing. And I'm looking at building it up slowly with the community that I already have. As of now the live streams and youtube will be ongoing no matter how the outcome will be when I approach organizations. If you have any questions please send me a message directly and I will be able to better explain. If it does not get fully funded I might create another funding based on where the project is at the end of this current fund raise. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Anonymous Diaries (NEW) - An online gallery for everyone who wishes to express their struggles in their own form (e.g.; drawings, paintings, quotes, articles).  The platform desires to provide individuals a sense of self-worth and belonging by knowing that they are accepted, unjudged, and no longer alone. Anonymous Diaries welcomes anyone who is willing to share their struggles, pain, misery, past experiences, relating to mental health.  This project would be materialized on my current website. 

Through “Searching Her”, I also intend to reach out to Mental Health organizations to be a bridge for mental health Patients who want and need professional help. 

My vision is for “Searching Her” to be a place of support for you and me.

To Love the Unloved, To hear the unheard, To give the unwanted a sense of belonging.

A place of support for you and me. 
Where I Began
When I started Searching Her, I lost my confidence as I had a lot of self doubt. Thinking that what I do would not matter or be able to create any impact in someone's life. Finances were also a huge concern having a family to feed. Youtube was challenging because i couldn't gather my thoughts constantly, talking to a camera was also daunting. There was that missing connection i couldn't feel behind a screen.
How It Started
When I first knew about Live Streaming, I thought to myself this could be an opportunity. Without thinking much I created an account on that very same day. Watching tutorials night after night, doing the setting up was not an easy feat. I started talking to people on the platform as I was very lonely, and was looking for just some company to chat with. 
Little did i expect that I would meet many people who are going through similar situations/experiences like myself. And that was when I said, I'm not giving up anymore. Simply because there were so many people out there who did not have an avenue to turn too. And we are all in our dark deepest corners, going through the motion of life and NOT LIVING. Having to catch up with society and what and how media portrays in normalized. We lost touch with our inner soul. 
Least to my surprise,I made to Affiliation Programme of a streaming platform called Twitch Twitch.tv after 6 days which was a huge accomplishment for me, something i dare not even dream about since everyone else was mostly about gaming and Vlogging.
Many people actually started coming forward to express the struggles they were going through when I was live. Many who felt rejected, depressed, and isolated from the society norms. And that was another reason I kept on fighting my personal struggles and conditions.
To my surprise, the act of giving, the act of kindness, the act of listening with a heart, could possibly change not just 1 but many peoples life, because they found a sense of belonging and they found the support they have been searching for. Not only have they received grace but they came back even when they were in better conditions to share the  grace, love, kindness and support they received to the others who are now in need now.
Your Impact
I am not a certified therapist nor a psychologist. But what makes it so special is that people have found a thriving community with so much love and warmth. That people did not need to hide how they truly feel and conceal who they really are behind the screen whilst still having genuine frienships as they go along the way. That itself is indescribable. The simple tools of life of a human being which doesn't cost you anything was all that someone needs to get the hope and strength to grow through their daily life battles one step at a time. 
This is not to replace professional help especially for people who have Mental Disorders. But rather to be a bridge for people who are in distress or new to Mental Health. To allow and encourage people to step forward with courage in their own space and comfort. In order for them to seek professional help. And along the way continue their jouney together in the world of humanity. 
Scoiety these days has spoken too little about our mental health when our mental health should be a top priority. Think of it this way, a human being needs a heart and a brain to function. Without either, there will be nothing left of us but a souless body. 
I sincerely hope to make an impact by empowering others with their story and a meaningful purpose for their lives amidst the struggles they are going through.  Please hear me out further.
Everyone deserves to be heard and have a chance at life no matter the lemons that it gives you. 
With good support and opportunities given to people the power of healing oneself by helping others is rewarding. 
On a side note, I share my family reality life in real-time when the kids are at home with my viewers, as unconventional it may seem. For a start whatever I have started is unconventional of its own. I don't have an explanation for this entire family reality which i do except, A genuine heart. It was a tough decison as exposing my family was a risk that we decided to take. - When my viewers tell me, look, that is warmth i've never got to experience in my life. It makes my heart so full to know that such a risk/decision I made could also be shared with someone else across the world.
 I go through my mental conditions every day, my spouse also suffers from PTSD, Depression, Alcohol Addiction, Anxiety Disorder and Agoraophia due to childhood and being in the military for over 10 years. (Left Military Now) . 
Secondly, whether you have a mental health illness or disorder, that doesn't mean you don't and can't deserve to have a family. It is possible to have  a family, It is possible for you to find someone who will love you and accept you for who you are. It is possible for you to have kids, and that you are and will be enough for your children. Whether you choose to have kids naturally or via adoption. The Key is - That should not bar you from thinking that you do not and will never be able to have a family of your own. 

Finances
Here I will explain to you what the finances/plans are
Hoping to raise SGD$20,000 inclusive of the deduction fees. 
1. Equipment such as a camera, webcam, lightings etc through better quality content, talk shows and podcast for viewers help bridge this big gap by normalizing mental health issues and potentially save lives that are suffering in silence.
2. Advertsing to Support Groups that enables me to carry on with this project. and to be able to reach more people in dire need. ( So many people on support groups that I have seen, have not benefited from it and that the community is toxic and that is extremly disheartening to see and hear of) 
3. Twitch is just a platform I'm using as it's free. I'm looking into going in Youtube fully so that people may also watch at their own convenience, space and comfort especially for people who have not been able to overcome the stigma of getting judged as well. Everything takes time and we can be that positive aid to help someone take the first step. 
4. Website Service + Software for both streaming and Video Editing required for me to continue what i'm doing for both live streams and Youtube.
5. Reaching Out to Organizations once everything is set in place I'm looking at about 3 to 6 months for me to pitch and propose so that we can extend this platform and idea to create more awareness and also avenue for people. 
6. Talk Shows with Professionals, Ground Level Individuals to share their experiences and professional advice as deemed. (Informative level)
7. A FREE mobile app creator -  on a bigger spectrum solely for outreach support in real-time with both volunteers and professionals, podcast, provide live chats with viewers, meditation groups, counselors, psychologist and therapist.
8. A book at the end of this journey about my life story and how searching her came about. And about how, anyone in this world have a choice to do something positive no matter how trival it maybe. Because each of us, are a contributing factor to the human race and world. Incorporated with other mental health suffers short stories. 
In order for the community to thrive and for me to be able to execute the plans, I need to ask for funding as I am unfit to work due to my condition, and my spouse and i have dedicated our life, and family for this cause even before creating this funding. It is only with the community that is in the current support group that enables me to carry on with this project. And with your help to fund the project will we be able to reach out to more people in dire need. 
We are all aware that coming out to speak about Mental Health and to seek help is very scary and exhausting not knowing where to go too, or for many cases, people cannot afford to seek therapy as it is too costly. If everyone contributes a little in their own way, whether it's through finances or by offering volunteer support or even spreading word of the campaign. Many lives could change, this itself can give many people the hope and courgae in the midst of darkness whether it's Mental Health-Related or Not. 
Lastly, If this project does not reach its funding goal, the finances would then be used for the smaller scales projects, for eg: equipment, software, reaching out to organisations, marketing.

Risks & Challenges
The completion of the project would be tentative as it is ongoing. And I'm looking at building it up slowly with the community that I already have. As of now the live streams and youtube will be ongoing no matter how the outcome will be when I approach organizations. If you have any questions please send me a message directly and I will be able to better explain. If it does not get fully funded I might create another funding based on where the project is at the end of this current fund raise. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Anonymous Diaries (NEW) - An online gallery for everyone who wishes to express their struggles in their own form (e.g.; drawings, paintings, quotes, articles).  The platform desires to provide individuals a sense of self-worth and belonging by knowing that they are accepted, unjudged, and no longer alone. Anonymous Diaries welcomes anyone who is willing to share their struggles, pain, misery, past experiences, relating to mental health.  This project would be materialized on my current website. 
Through “Searching Her”, I also intend to reach out to Mental Health organizations to be a bridge for mental health Patients who want and need professional help. 
My vision is for “Searching Her” to be a place of support for you and me.
To Love the Unloved, To hear the unheard, To give the unwanted a sense of belonging.

story:
Summary

Queerenstein Bears The Podcast is the brainchild of CeeJay and  Michael! This podcast is a truly unique and different podcast experience. Our host bring a different look at everyday topics like traveling for business vs traveling to pleasure, social media, the media and its representation of the  LGBTQIA+ community, plus many other issues. CeeJay and Michael are unafraid to voice their opinions of controversial topics and call out those who are wrong.

Who is CeeJay?

CeeJay is the husband  of Drag Race and Netflix Superstar, Ginger Minj. CeeJay comes to this project with a background in hospitality and entertainment management. CeeJay has a passion  for travel and everything entertainment. Growing up, he was trained in the art of professional wrestling and has been a crucial part of the backstage working in many theatres. 

Who is Michael?

Michael is a world traveler and a pop culture Guru! Michael comes to  this  project with a  degree in hospitality and YEARS of experience of working in some of the most upscale hotels in the world. Michael has a passion for travel and EVERYTHING Lady Gaga and pop music!

This project is important to us both because there is nothing out there that talks about growing up in the world of being a gay bear (a name for a hairy gay person). We are  trying to be the role models and voice for those that we never had  growing up. We also  have a very unique perspective of the world due to the experiences we both have. 

 

What We Need

I'd  like  to break down what your donations will go towards:

  • Better Equipment  for both our Tuesday Podcast and our Friday Live Streams
  • Bringing high profile Guests onto the show
  • Marketing to reach a bigger audience
  • Adding more production value to every episode and live stream

 

Risks & Challenges

We every project, there are risks and challenges. Some challenges:

  • Losing listeners ( a way to keep people listening is to structure our episodes in a way that  puts the fun stuff towards the end) 
  • Reaching listeners  (a way to overcome this challenge is to target market certain demographics)
  • Keeping people engaged with topics (To overcome this challenge is to find  trending topics that impact our audience or that are controversial)  

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that with the ongoing pandemic and millions of people being out of work, you may not have the means to contribute. If you simply share this on your social media and get the word out. 

Make sure you follow us on social media and our website to stay up to date with everything  Queerenstein Bears!

story:
About Heavy Metal History:

Heavy Metal History started in December of 2016 by Dustin Koetsch with the help of his Australian mate Matt Jordan as a podcast to audibly chronicle the history of the Heavy metal genre. Over the course of 65 episodes we've had various metal musicians to talk about and chronicle their records as well as our own oral history episodes starting at the genesis of heavy metal with the band Black Sabbath. We eventually covered most of 1980, then jumping forward into 1987 and current have been deconstructing 1998. Over the year our podcast has grown more than we expected and we feel our content is extremely original and fun.

 

Our current situation:

About a month ago Dustins MacBook where all episodes are recorded, edited and kept on file began acting erratic by shutting down and rebooting randomly as well as overheating. Eventually the computer shut off all together and got stuck in a "boot loop" Dustin took the computer to see if it could be repaired, after 3 days the diagnosis came in that the logic board had failed and due to the age of the computer it can not be ordered or repaired. Dustin currently works 2 jobs to pay for bills and other various life essentials and can not afford a comparable replacement. This is where you come in...

 

Our Goal:

Dustin and Matt's goal to keep the podcast alive is to get our faithful and even casual listeners, through various perks to help get a new comparable computer to help save and keep heavy metal history alive and going. This podcast has been one of Dustins biggest passions after a rough couple years of personal life issues and he looks forward every week to recording and putting out these episodes. Without the podcast it feels like there is less purpose in life. We hope you all will channel the power of the metal gods such as Lemmy, Dimebag Darrel and the Ozzman himself to save our Podcast! 

The only items were looking to find are for:

The lowest price option for a Mac which is $1,299 before tax

And the cost of getting stickers printed. 

That's it. Super simple, all money goes directly to the podcast. 

Thanks for checking us out.

story:
Season 1 of The Story of The Sikhs, was launched in February 2018. The podcast has been extremely well received and has been downloaded more than 26,000 times with listeners in more than 80 countries.  With a focus on storytelling, the meticulously researched podcast combines narration with Gurbani, music and poetry to present Sikh history in a unique and engaging manner. In particular, the podcast has been very successful in reaching young Sikhs in the diaspora, who hunger for world class content that is accessible and speaks to them.

The Story of the Sikhs team is now working on Season  2, which we hope to launch by April 2019.

Season 2 starts with the ascension of Guru Hargobind and concludes with the passing of Guru Gobind Singh and draws heavily on traditional Sikh sources such as Gurbilas Patshahi Cheyvin, Sri Gur Sobha by Senapati and Asht Guru Chamatkar by Bhai Vir Singh. It includes original translations from the above sources as well as original poetic translations of Gurbani . It also incorporates Gurbani Kirtan by legendary kirtaniyas such as Bhai Avtar Singh, Bhai Dharm Singh Zakhmi, Bhai Santa Singh, Gyani Dyal Singh, Bibi Jaswant Kaur and Ustad Ghulamm Hussain Shaggan.

We are working on creating a resource that will serve the Panth for years to come. If you feel that this endeavor has value, please support us.

story:
Short Summary

There are over 2 million souls locked away in America's jails and prisons. Some are very young, some very old. Some are doing time for minor crimes, some are doing time for very serious crimes. Some are coming home soon. Some will die in prison. 

Hidden among those millions are amazingly talented rappers, singers, poets, and authors. I'm creating a portal for you to see and hear their talents. I’m going to show you how the light of the human spirit shines even in the most darkest places on earth. I’m going to show you the redemptive value of men, women, and children who society has deemed of no value. 

You will be able to come to my webpage, click on the photo, and hear them rap, sing, do poetry, or tell short stories. You’ll be able to vote for your favorites and vote to have them compete with other visitors to the pages’ favorites. You will be able to hear them interviewed on my podcast. But most of all, more than being entertained, you will be left in awe by the talent and gifts displayed by these prisoners from every walk of life and prisons all over America. 

I have created the foundation for this vision to come to life. I have the pieces to the puzzle. Now. I need to raise $5,000 for this initial stage of development. 

For every donation of $25 or more, I will send you a “Hit Da Bricks” t-shirt with our fist/phone logo. 

Thank you so much for your support. I promise you it will be the most unique experience you have ever had when it comes to the Internet. And I’ll keep every donor updated as to the progress of bringing it online. Every donor will get a free one-year subscription to the podcast, “The Prisoner Phone-In Show”. The podcast will be coming online in the not too distant future.

What We Need & What You Get

The 5,000 raised will be spent as so:

For a P.O Box, my business license, advertising in 3 issues of Criminal Legal News, quality recording equipment and software.
